subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Gonzalez, who had homered in his last three at-bats, hit a three-run homer in the first inning, and Colorado beat visiting Houston, 11-5, to complete a sweep.
snippet: Carlos Gonzalez, who had homered in his last three at-bats, hit a three-run homer in the first inning, and Colorado beat visiting Houston, 11-5, to complete a sweep.
